package.name: vue-essential-slices
package.description: A set of professionally made, accessible Vue components, linked to a (Prismic) backend

scripts.prepare: git clone https://github.com/vuejs/vue-loader temp; rm -rf node_modules/vue-loader; mv temp node_modules/vue-loader

call_to_action.description: A predesigned 'Call to action' for section for your site
